title: Bug 138175 - Bookmark link set in drill through link should be saved in Hyperlink Options dialog.
description: When working with the Hyperlink Options dialog, the selected bookmark is not displayed, even though it is saved in the xml source.
OB: Reopen Hyperlink Options dialog. Result: The selected bookmark is gone but it is saved in the xml source.
EB: The bookmark link set in the drill-through link should be saved and displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the Hyperlink Options dialog. 2. Set a bookmark link in the drill-through link. 3. Close the dialog. 4. Reopen the Hyperlink Options dialog. Result: The selected bookmark is gone but it is saved in the xml source. Expected result: The target bookmark should be displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
